pageContext.claim: “Well, they [NATO] build an office building for $3 billion. They do lots of things that they shouldn't be doing, before I got here.”
pageContext.analysis: NATO's new headquarters cost about $1.23 billion, according to the NATO budget and current exchange rates. When Trump first saw the building in 2017, he remarked: "I never asked once what the new NATO headquarters cost. I refuse to do that, but it is beautiful."
